hero.title: Human Pattern Lab
hero.subtitle: A tiny research lab for understanding how humans behave, decide, spiral, recover, and try again.

whatWeDo.title: What we study
whatWeDo.body: We map the patterns underneath everyday life: how people make choices, protect their energy, burn out, build systems, and occasionally turn everything into a delightful mess.

departments.title: Departments & units
departments.body: From Feline Epistemology to Raccoon Behavioral Sciences, each department explores a different angle of "why are humans like this?"

mascots.title: Mascot faculty
mascots.body: Our mascot faculty turn abstract ideas into cozy, visual characters: judgment, curiosity, emotional climate, and cognitive maps all get their own chibi representative.

labNotes.title: Lab notes
labNotes.body: Essays, experiments, and field notes from the Human Pattern Lab.
